subject: Watch Xbox 360 editors come out of the box
body:
IGN Insider: Out of the Box Show














Watch Xbox 360 editors Erik Brudvig and Hilary Goldstein tackle the latest games and downloadable content for Microsoft?s gaming console.
 Join Insider today and get:

 • Hi-Res gameplay videos 

• Downloadable guides 
• Head-to-Head reviews
• Video Tips
